name: Can You Get Out ?
description:
Can you survive the mind-blending maze and it's monsters or will you give up on getting out? The game challenges your sense of direction and provokes  helplessness as you flee inside the maze looking for the exit. Three monsters guard each section of the maze, you'll have to get the key first (One of two keys hidden in maze) and then get out of the maze.

Note : Hard mode of the game changes  few  in-game areas and adds more patrolling guards who are faster than the normal version.

If you liked the game consider donating here on itch.io ❤

Thank you

Dev - Ritvik Shukla
